front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for DC Inclined Plane Tracking and Erosion Test for Outdoor Insulation Applications

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: the inclined plane tracking and erosion test
front.abstract: The various important aspects that need to be considered are described for the reliable evaluation of the tracking and erosion resistances of polymeric outdoor insulating materials using the inclined plane tracking and erosion DC voltages.
